resources.string: \ This game is played like regular Tic Tac Toe with one difference. To win a tile you have to win a smaller game of Tic Tac Toe inside that tile.\n\ In case of a tie in a small board, that tile will count for both sides in the larger game.

string-array.name: tip_text_array
string-array.item: Taking over the middle spot allows for the most ways to win.
Anticipate the other player\'s moves to learn how to beat them.
